title: You Have Nothing Without Trust | Relationship Theory
description: Tom and Lisa discuss relationship questions asked by the community!! From earning trust with your significant other to discussing clear forms of communication to each other, this episode is packed with great information that will give you some introspective insights into your own relationships. This is one episode of Relationship Theory you are not going to want to miss!  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Tom Bilyeu is the co-founder of 2014 Inc. 500 company Quest Nutrition — a unicorn startup valued at over $1 billion — and the co-founder and host of Impact Theory. Impact Theory is a first-of-its-kind company designed to facilitate global change through the incubation of mission-based businesses and the cultivation of empowering content. Every piece of content Impact Theory creates is meant to underscore the company mission to free people from The Matrix and help them unlock their true potential. Impact Theory exists to inspire the next generation of game-changing companies and creators that will make a true and lasting impact on the world.
